documentation.text:
@dev Returns the total number of tokens available in the system.
 @return The total number of tokens in circulation.

allowance(address,address).details: Checks how many tokens the owner (`owner`) has approved for use by the address (`spender`).

params.spender: The address allowed to spend the tokens.
params.tokenOwner: The address of the token owner.

returns._0: The number of tokens the `spender` is allowed to use.

approve(address,uint256).details: Approves the address (`spender`) to spend a specified number of tokens (`value`) on behalf of the contract owner. Must return `true` if the operation is successful.

params.spender: The address allowed to spend the tokens.
params.value: The number of tokens to approve.

returns._0: Returns `true` if the operation is successful.

balanceOf(address).details: Returns the balance of tokens held by the given address (`who`).

params.who: The address to query the balance for.

returns._0: The number of tokens owned by the given address.

totalSupply().details: Returns the total number of tokens available in the system.

returns._0: The total number of tokens in circulation.

transfer(address,uint256).details: Transfers a specified amount of tokens (`value`) to the address `to`. Must return `true` if the transaction succeeds.

params.to: The address of the token recipient.
params.value: The number of tokens to transfer.

returns._0: Returns `true` if the operation is successful.

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).details: Transfers tokens from one address (`from`) to another (`to`) if previously approved. Must return `true` if the operation is successful.

params.from: The address from which the tokens are sent.
params.to: The address to which the tokens are sent.
params.value: The number of tokens to transfer.

returns._0: Returns `true` if the operation is successful.
